synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved weighing raw materials in a glove box under an argon atmosphere, mixing to prepare a powder, pelletizing a portion, firing it in a quartz ampoule at 600Â°C for 8 hours to obtain a sulfide-based pellet, pressing the pellet into a plate, attaching gold electrodes, conducting AC impedance measurements, and verifying the presence of an aldirodite phase using XRD.
